thread.title: Prize draw terms and conditions: win a holiday
thread.title_full: Prize draw terms and conditions: win a holiday - Telegraph

author: The Telegraph
title: Prize draw terms and conditions: win a holiday
text: Looking for a gourmet getaway? Discover delicious food and fine wine in Australia » 1. This prize draw is open to residents of the UK, Channel Islands, Isle of Man and Republic of Ireland aged 18 years or over, except employees of Telegraph Media Group Limited and its group companies (“Promoter”), and Tourism Australia, their families, agents or anyone else professionally associated with the draw. 2. Details of how to enter form part of the terms and conditions. It is a condition of entry that all rules are accepted as final and that the competitor agrees to abide by these rules. The decision of the judges is final and no correspondence will be entered into. 3. Entries must be submitted via telegraph.co.uk/tasteofaustralia and entry is restricted to one per person. Once submitted, entries cannot be amended in any way. 4. Late, illegible, incomplete, defaced or corrupt entries or entries sent through agencies and third parties will not be accepted. No responsibility can be accepted for lost entries and proof of despatch will not be accepted as proof of receipt. The winner will be drawn at random from all entries received by the closing date. The winner’s name and county can be obtained by sending a sae to Tourism Australia Winner, SPARK, Telegraph Media Group, 111 Buckingham Palace Road, London SW1W 0DT within one month after the closing date of the prize draw. 5. All entries must be received by midnight on Sunday 14 October 2015. 6. The winner will be contacted within 10 days of the closing date of the prize draw. Should the Promoter be unable to contact the winner or should the winner be unable to accept the prize, the Promoter reserves the right to award the prize to an alternative winner, drawn in accordance with these terms and conditions. 7. The prize as described is available on the date of publication. Should the prize become unavailable, a substitute of equal value shall be provided. 8. One winning entrant will win their choice of one of the three following travel packages for two people to Australia: • Go Gastro in Sydney and Melbourne; • Double Delights in Sydney and Brisbane; or • On the food trail in Melbourne and Perth. The winner’s guest must be over 18 years of age. Each package includes return business class flights for two people from London, Manchester or Edinburgh with Etihad Airways, travel insurance and Australian tourist visas. The details of each prize package can be found in the appendix to these terms and conditions, below. 9. The prize package must be taken as one package and must be booked and ticketed before 31 December 2015 and all travel completed by December 10, 2016. The prize is not valid for travel during the following dates: • October 26 to November 30; • December 10, 2015 to January 15, 2016; and Once confirmed, the booking cannot be amended. The winner and their guest must travel together at all times. 10. Travel insurance is subject to normal terms of acceptance. Pre-existing medical conditions may not be covered and cover may be purchased at the winner’s own expense. 11. Where an Australian tourist visa is not granted to the winner, the prize will be forfeit and no responsibility shall attach to either the Promoter or its agents, Tourism Australia or Etihad Airways as a result thereof. 12. Where car hire is offered as part of a prize package, the driver must be over 25 years of age and hold a full clean driver’s licence for a minimum of two years. Fully inclusive refers to unlimited mileage, collision damage waiver, theft protection, local taxes and airport fees. Driver must also hold a valid credit card (not debit card) with a minimum of £500 available for security deposit, which is refundable upon safe return of the vehicle. Additional fees may apply. 13. Hotels are classed as a 4 Star and are based on two people sharing a twin or double room (winner’s choice) with ensuite bathroom on a bed and breakfast basis. 14. Travel insurance is subject to normal terms of acceptance. Pre-existing medical conditions may not be covered. No age restrictions apply. 15. The prize packages do not include travel between the winner’s home and airport, personal expenditure, meals other than those specified, or incidental costs, other than where mentioned. It is the responsibility of the prizewinner to ensure they have a valid passport and obtain any necessary vaccinations for their trip. 16. All elements of the prize are subject to availability, non- transferable and there are no cash alternatives. 17. The winner may be required to participate in reasonable publicity on behalf of the Promoter and Tourism Australia. 18. Entrants’ data will be used for the purpose of administration of this prize draw and in accordance with the permissions granted or withheld at the point of entry. 19. Events may occur that render the prize draw itself or the awarding of the prize impossible due to reasons beyond the control of the Promoter and accordingly the Promoter may at its absolute discretion vary or amend the promotion and the entrant agrees that no liability shall attach to the Promoter as a result thereof. 20. The Telegraph is responsible for the first part of the promotion, which is the publication and adjudication of the prize draw. Provision of the prize is the responsibility of NDL Group. 21. These Terms and Conditions are to be interpreted in accordance with English law and any dispute arising out of these Terms or their subject matter is subject to the exclusive jurisdiction of the English Courts. Promoter: Telegraph Media Group Limited, 111 Buckingham Palace Road, London, SW1W 0DT. Appendix Sydney and Melbourne The prize package comprises: Sydney • Return transfers from the airport to the hotel • 7 Nights accommodation for two people at the 4 star Parkroyal Darling Harbour • Breakfast for two people each morning in the hotel restaurant • Blue Mountain and Wildlife Park tour for two people. Includes: o Return transportation from pick up and drop off points o Local guide o Admission to Featherdale Wildlife Park o WIFI on the coach • Sydney gourmet food tour for two people. Includes: o Transport by air-conditioned minivan o Local guide o Small-group tour o Food tastings • Lunch at Cottage Point Inn by Seaplane from Sydney for two people. Includes: o Return seaplane flight from Sydney to Ku-ring-gai Chase National Park o Scenic Flight over Bondi Beach, Harbour Bridge and Sydney Opera House o Gourmet three-course a la carte lunch o Live commentary on board Melbourne • Domestic Virgin Australia flights for two people from Sydney to Melbourne • Car hire for 7 nights in Melbourne • 6 Nights accommodation for two people at the 4 star Novotel Melbourne on Collins • Breakfast for two people each morning in the hotel restaurant • Private Mornington Peninsula Winery Tour for two people. Includes: o Transport in luxury private vehicle (Chrysler Grand Voyager) o Mornington Peninsula wine tastings o A la Carte one course lunch including bread, a matching glass of estate wine and tea/coffee • Overnight accommodation at the 4 star Royal Mail Hotel • Breakfast for two people in the hotel restaurant • Eight course dinner with wine pairing in the Royal Mail Hotel Dining Room for two people • £1,000.00 Spending money Sydney and Brisbane The prize package comprises: Sydney • Return transfers from the airport to the hotel • 7 Nights accommodation for two people at the 4 star Novotel Sydney Harbour • Breakfast for two people each morning in the hotel restaurant • Tasting menu and wine pairing dinner for two people at Icebergs • Hunter Valley Wine tour for two people from Sydney. Includes: o Transport by air-conditioned coach o Local guide o Three wine tastings o Lunch paired with matching wines o Live commentary on board • Sydney Harbour lunch cruise for two people. Includes: o 3 Course Australian BBQ lunch o Regional wines and local beers o Onboard activities including fishing and swimming o Skipper and host Brisbane • Domestic Virgin Australia flights for two people from Sydney to Brisbane • Car hire for 7 nights – Collection from Brisbane • 4 Nights accommodation for two people at the 4 star Four Points by Sheraton Hotel • Breakfast for two people each morning in the hotel restaurant • Mount Tamborine Wine and Winery tour from Brisbane for two people. Includes: o Hotel pickup and drop-off o Transport by air-conditioned minivan o Lunch o Snacks o Bottled water o Wine tasting o Local guide Noosa • 3 Nights accommodation for two people at the 5 star Sheraton Noosa Resort and Spa • Breakfast for two people each morning in the hotel restaurant • Noosa Everglades BBQ lunch cruise for two people. Includes: o Return hotel transfers o Noosa Everglades cruise o Morning tea o Educational commentary o Aussie BBQ lunch at Harry's Hut • Deep Sea Fishing for two people. Includes: o All necessary equipment including fishing tackle and bait o Tea, coffee, water and soft drinks o Knowledgeable and friendly crew will assist with fishing o Snacks • £1,000.00 Spending money Melbourne and Perth The prize package comprises: • Car hire for 7 nights – collection from Melbourne Melbourne • Overnight nights accommodation for two people at the Art Series Hotel – The Olsen • Breakfast for two people each morning in the hotel restaurant Morning Peninsula • Overnights accommodation for two people at Lindenderry at Red Hill Hotel • Breakfast for two people in the hotel restaurant Great Ocean Road • 2 Nights accommodation for two people at Saint Patrick’s Luxury Boutique Hotel • Breakfast for two people in the hotel restaurant Grampian National Park • Overnight accommodation at the 4 star Royal Mail Hotel • Breakfast for two people in the hotel restaurant • Eight course dinner with wine pairing in the Royal Mail Hotel Dining Room for two people Melbourne • 2 Nights accommodation for two people at the Art Series Hotel – The Olsen • Breakfast for two people each morning in the hotel restaurant • Progressive degustation walking tour for two people. Includes: o Local guide o Visit three unique venues o Exclusive wine tastings o Tastings from their menus • Yarra Valley Balloon Flight and Winery Tour for two people. Includes: o Return hotel transfers o Local guide o Buffet breakfast with sparkling wine o Lunch o Glass of wine with lunch o Wine tasting • Domestic Virgin Australia flights for two people from Melbourne to Perth • Car hire for 7 nights – collection in Perth Margaret River • 3 Nights accommodation at the 5 star Pullman Resort Bunker Bay • Breakfast for two people each morning in the hotel restaurant • Vasse Felix Winery Tour for two people. Includes: o Behind the scenes look at their winemaking o Tutored tasting of wines o Light refreshments and a glass of wine on arrival o Dinner for two people in the Vasse Felix restaurant o Bottle of Premier wine to take home Perth • 4 Nights accommodation for two people at the 4 star Four Points by Sheraton Hotel • Breakfast for two people each morning in the hotel restaurant • Dinner for two people at the Cott & Co Fish Bar • £1,000.00 Spending money
